title: Barcelona 'furious with midfielder Arthur Melo' after night out with Neymar ahead of Getafe clash
text:
Barcelona midfielder Arthur Melo faces the wrath of the Spanish giants again after he enjoyed another night out with Brazil team-mate Neymar.

Barca boss Ernesto Valverde played down the issue during his press conference ahead of Saturday's game against Getafe but Spanish outlet Marca reported that club officials were less than impressed with his decision to go out with Neymar on Thursday night.

Arthur had to apologise last season after he was the only Barcelona player to attend the former Blaugrana man's birthday party in Paris just 48 hours before the club's Copa del Rey clash against Real Madrid.

Neymar posted a photo on Instagram with Arthur Melo and Leo Baptistao in Barcelona

Paris Saint-Germain forward Neymar posted a photo on Instagram with Melo and former Espanyol forward Leo Baptistao, who now plays in China for Wuhan Zall, on Thursday night, just hours before he was due to appear at Barcelona's Social Court in his dispute over an unpaid loyalty bonus worth €26million (£22.77m).

Neymar did not appear in court on Friday and instead flew back to Paris as the two parties' legal teams tried to reach an agreement.

Neymar is expected to be in the PSG squad to face Bordeaux on Saturday evening.

Their winning run came to a halt on Wednesday with Hassane Kamara and Boulaye Dia firing Reims to a shock 2-0 win at the Parc des Prince.
description: Barcelona midfielder Arthur Melo faces the wrath of the Spanish giants again after he enjoyed another night out with Brazil team-mate Neymar.
